inclusion.criterion: serum 25-OH D level < or + to 25 ng/mL
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: anti-convulsant therapy, anti-hypertensive therapy, lipid lowering medication
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable

exclusion.criterion: any medications that affect glucose metabolism (e.g., metformin, insulin)
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable

exclusion.criterion: any disorders of bone or calcium metabolism
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: Her laboratory study is remarkable for Vit D: 14ng/ml and otherwise healthy

exclusion.criterion: baseline serum Calcium > 11 ng/dL (> 2 SD above the mean)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any genetic disorder that predisposes to obesity (e.g., Prader Willi
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan who comes to clinic with some general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
